subject: Haptic Brackets for Order# SSN2210
description_text:
Good Evening, 

I purchased the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor
Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate

The description was a little vague as to what is included. My question is, are the Haptic Reactor mounting brackets included with the purchase or do I need to purchase them separately. Thank you for your assistance. 

Have a great day, 

Jason

conversations.body_text: Hi Jason Pena,    We apologize for any confusion. Haptic Reactors must be selected and purchased here. Your order is for the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate, without any additional Haptic Reactors. Additionally, the mounting bracket, power supply, and power adapter are included with the purchase of Haptics and do not require additional purchase.

Well that’s not ideal. The description is extremely misleading. It specifically says “With Haptic Reactor.”  Had it been clear I would’ve included it in the order and taken advantage of the free shipping and not spent the extra $30.  What are my options? Can I add it to my order? Please advise at your earliest convenience. 

>
Hi Jason Pena,    Please let me know which model you need to add, and I can give you a link with no shipping charges.
You can click this link to make a payment: VAM Pro Linear Motor (3 pac/includes power supply)  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1
Hi Jason Pena,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045835272674
